scripts.ios: set -e && (lsof -ti:8081 > /dev/null 2>&1 || (pnpm start > /dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 6)) && cd ios && (xcrun simctl list devices booted | grep -q Booted || (xcrun simctl boot 'iPhone 17 Pro' 2>&1 | grep -v 'already booted' || true && sleep 3)) && xcodebuild -workspace VeroxosKitchen.xcworkspace -scheme VeroxosKitchen -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro' -derivedDataPath ./build build 2>&1 | grep -E '(BUILD|succeeded|failed)' | tail -1 && xcrun simctl install booted ./build/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/VeroxosKitchen.app > /dev/null 2>&1 && xcrun simctl launch booted com.veroxos.kitchen > /dev/null 2>&1
